City Council

City Council
============

The City Council is the governing and lawmaking body of the City Government, and they shall have and exercise all powers granted by the City Charter, State Law, and the State Constitution. The Council also provides legislative leadership in establishing ordinances, resolutions and policies.

The City of Port Lavaca is a home rule charter run by the city council and the city manager.

**[View City Council Meetings and Agendas](https://portlavaca.org/city-government/city-council/city-council-meetings-and-agendas/)**
